title: When Jesus Came to Jordan

lyrics.text:
When Jesus came to Jordan To be baptized by John, He did not come for pardon, But as his Father's Son.
He came to share repentance With all who mourn their sins, To speak the vital sentence With which good news begins.

He came to share temptation, Our utmost woe and loss, For us and our salvation To die upon the cross.
So when the Dove descended On him, the Son of Man, The hidden years had ended, The age of grace began.

Come, Holy Spirit, aid us To keep the vows we make, This very day invade us, And every bondage break.
Come, give our lives direction, The gift we covet most: To share the resurrection That leads to Pentecost.

author: Fred Pratt Green (1973)
